text: Innopolis (; ) is an urban settlement in Verkhneuslonsky District of the Republic of Tatarstan, Russia, a satellite of Kazan, the capital of the republic. Residential area, 2016 The main building of the University of Innopolis, 2016 Innopolis was established on December 24, 2012Resolution #2622-IV-GS as a technology park ("IT Village"). The change of the status from village to urban was granted to it on December 16, 2014.Law #115-ZRT Within the framework of administrative divisions, the town of Innopolis is subordinated to Verkhneuslonsky District.Order #01-02/9 As a municipal division, Innopolis is incorporated within Verkhneuslonsky Municipal District as Innopolis Urban Settlement.Law #19-ZRT ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * * * Category:Cities and towns in Tatarstan Category:Populated places established in 2012 Category:Naukograds Category:Information technology places
title: Innopolis
